content.title: Add UI to Home
content.body:
1. Navigate to the Default Library tab on the bottom left of your canvas and search for the Label widget.
  2. Drag and drop the Label widget onto the frmHome form on your canvas.
  3. Navigate to the Properties panel and select the Look tab.
  4. Under Appearance, modify the value of Text: Welcome to Home Screen
  5. Under Flex, modify the values of the following properties:
    • Left: 35%
    • Top: 10%
